title: Acute tryptophan depletion (ATD) induces depressive symptoms in subgroups of recovered depressed patients, including those with seasonal affective disorder (SAD) (Van der Does, 2001a, review).
abstract: Acute tryptophan depletion (ATD) induces depressive symptoms in subgroups of recovered depressed patients, including those with seasonal affective disorder (SAD) (Van der Does, 2001a, review). - Volume 33 Issue 6
